text:
[Bharata grieves over his misfortune -- accuses Kaikeyi in so many words -- reveals his decision to bring back Rama to Ayodhya and serve him.]

सश्रूत्वा तु पितरं वृत्तं भ्रातरौ च विवासितौ।

भरतो दुःखसन्तप्त इदं वचनमब्रवीत्।।2.73.1।।
meaning: भरतः Bharata, पितरम् father, वृत्तम् had passed away, भ्रातरौ the two brothers, विवासितौ were in exile, श्रुत्वा तु having heard, दुःखसन्तप्तः afflicted with sorrow, इदम् these, वचनम् words, अब्रवीत् said.
translation: On hearing about the demise of the father and his two brothers sent in exile, Bharata overtaken by sorrow spoke thus:

text:
किं नु कार्यं हतस्येह मम राज्येन शोचतः।

विहीनस्याथ पित्रा च भ्रात्रा पितृसमेन च।।2.73.2।।
meaning: पित्रा च with father, अथ and, पितृसमेन like to a father to me, भ्रात्राच with brother, विहीनस्य bereft, शोचतः of a grieving one, हतस्य fallen into misfortunes, मम to me, इह now, राज्येन with the kingdom, किं नु कार्यम् of what avail?
translation: Bereft of my father and my brother who was like a father to me, of what avail is this kingdom to me when I am grieving and fallen into misfortunes?

text:
दुःखे मे दुःखमकरोर्व्रणे क्षारमिवादधाः।

राजानं प्रेतभावस्थं कृत्वा रामं च तापसम्।।2.73.3।।
meaning: राजानम् king, प्रेतभावस्थम् reducing to a corpse, रामं च also Rama, तापसम् as an ascetic, कृत्वा having made, मे to me, दुःखे in one sorrow, दुःखं another sorrow, (मे) अकरोः you have caused, व्रणे in the wound, क्षारम् salt, आदधाः इव like putting.
translation: You have caused the death of the king and reduced Rama to an ascetic. You have piled one sorrow over sorrow on me like rubbing salt to the wound

text:
कुलस्य त्वमभावाय कालरात्रिरिवाऽगता।

अङ्गारमुपगूह्य स्म पिता मे नावबुद्धवान्।।2.73.4।।
meaning: त्वम् you, कुलस्य family's, अभावाय for destruction, कालरात्रिरिव like a fatal night, आगता have arrived, मे पिता my father, अङ्गारम् a live charcoal, उपगूह्य having embraced, नावबुद्धवान् did not realize.
translation: You have come here for the destruction of this race, like a fatal night. My father did not realize that he was embracing a live charcoal.

text:
मृत्युमापादितो पिता त्वया मे पापदर्शिनि।

सुखं परिहृतं मोहात्कुलेऽस्मिन्कुलपांसनि।।2.73.5।।
meaning: पापदर्शिनि O woman of sinful thoughts, त्वया by you, मे पिता my father, मृत्युम् death, आपादितः was led to, कुलपांसनि O obloquy of the race, मोहात् out of folly, अस्मिन् कुले in this family, सुखम् happiness, परिहृतम् has been taken away.
translation: O woman of sinful thoughts, you have brought about the death of my father. O obloquy of the race, by your folly you have deprived this family of its happiness.

text:
त्वां प्राप्य हि पिता मेऽद्य सत्यसन्धो महायशाः।

तीव्रदुःखाभिसन्तप्तो वृत्तो दशरथो नृपः।।2.73.6।।
meaning: मे my, पिता father, सत्यसन्धः adhering to truth, महायशाः renowned, नृपः king, दशरथः Dasaratha, अद्य now, त्वाम् you, प्राप्य having come under your influence, तीव्र दुःखाभिसन्तप्तः tormented by intense grief, वृत्तः has departed from this world.
translation: My father king Dasaratha who is bound to truth and highly renowned, having come under your influence and tormented by intense grief has departed from this world.

text:
विनाशितो महाराजः पिता मे धर्मवत्सलः।

कस्मात्प्रव्राजितो रामः कस्मादेव वनं गतः।।2.73.7।।
meaning: धर्मवत्सलः righteous, महाराजः great king, मे पिता my father, कस्मात् for what reason, विनाशितः has been destroyed, रामः Rama, कस्मात् for what reason, प्रव्राजितः has been exiled, वनम् to the forest, गतः has gone.
translation: Why was my father the righteous maharaja killed? Why was Rama exiled into the forest?

text:
कौसल्या च सुमित्रा च पुत्रशोकाभिपीडिते।

दुष्करं यदि जीवेतां प्राप्य त्वां जननीं मम।।2.73.8।।
meaning: पुत्रशोकाभिपीडिते tormented by the grief on account of separation from their sons, कौशल्या च Kausalya and, सुमित्रा च Sumitra too, मम जननीम् my own mother, त्वाम् you, प्राप्य having obtained, जीवेतां यदि will survive, दुष्करम् difficult.
translation: Tormented by the grief of separation from their sons, it is difficult for Kausalya and Sumitra to survive under you, O my mother.

text:
ननुत्वार्योऽपि धर्मात्मा त्वयि वृतिमनुत्तमाम्।

वर्तते गुरुवृत्तिज्ञो यथा मातरि वर्तते।।2.73.9।।
meaning: धर्मत्मा righteous, गुरुवृत्तिज्ञः well aware of his duties towards elders, आर्योऽपि noble, too मातरि towards his mother, यथा as, वर्तते conducted himself, त्वयि towards you, अनुत्तमाम् very great, वृत्तिम् conduct, वर्तते ननु is abiding indeed.
translation: My noble and righteous brother (Rama), who is well aware of his duties to the elders conducted himself before you as he would before his own mother.

text:
तथा ज्येष्ठा हि मे माता कौसल्या दीर्घदर्शिनी।

त्वयि धर्मं समास्थाय भगिन्यामिव वर्तते।।2.74.10।।
meaning: तथा in the same way, मे my, ज्येष्टा eldest, माता mother, दीर्घदर्शिनी a lady with farsight, कौशल्या Kausalya, धर्मम् righteousness, समास्थाय having adhered, त्वयि towards you, भगिन्यामिव as if a sister, वर्तते हि conducted
translation: In the same way my eldest mother the farsighted Kausalya, too adhered to righteousness and conducted herself towards you like a sister.
